word: When they tell me of losses of temporal goods, I feel like this: It is not a soul. But the loss of a soul is of higher estimate than the whole world. "What shall it profit a man, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul? Or what will a man give in exchange for his soul?" [Mark 8:36, 37]. Please consider how you will settle this question with your Maker, just now, without delay.
